thread.title: Helping Clients Pare Company Stock

author: wsjcom
title: Helping Clients Pare Company Stock
text:
Abigail Gunderson • Wealth adviser at Tanglewood Total Wealth Management, Houston • Education: B.S., Ateneo de Manila University, Philippines • Professional designations: Certified Financial Planner
Background: With a degree in industrial engineering, Ms. Gunderson worked for the first part of her career as a crew procedures engineer for NASA. But after her husband nudged her to read a personal-finance book, “The Wealthy Barber,” she began contemplating a career in the financial industry. After staying home with her son...
